headline: Jim Jordan: The Canadian Trucker Protest Is About Fighting for Freedom
sentences:
EXCERPT:
JORDAN: "Where was the concern for business when they were locking down the economy, telling small business owners you couldn’t open up your business that you poured your life into, that you poured your investment and your family’s life into?
Where was the concern there when they were telling people you couldn't go to work unless you had this — so now to say that — I think it rings hollow.
I like the — I love the grandfather there who said this is about freedom and the future, this is about his grandkids.
And it doesn’t sound to me like, the statements we heard, doesn't sound to me like they're leaving any time soon."
Americans and Canadians obviously and people around the world, we’ve had it.
They’re so sick of the double standard, so sick of the mandates.
And God bless those truckers for standing firm.
What we want is what God gave us, freedom.
That’s what this is all about.
